content: Begging to her, the afflicted cried: "Living, flying, how do I hurt you? But you do hurt me, squeezing my wings! Oh, let me go! I, too, am a daughter of God!"
translations: ita:A lei supplicando l'afflitta gridò﹕ Vivendo, volando, che male ti fò﹖ Tu sì mi fai male stringendomi l'ale! Deh, lasciam
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by shekitten (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
